snippet: Denver police officers shot a man suspected of killing a woman and wounding another after he fired at explosive devices made out of propane tanks that he had placed in a street.
abstract: Denver police officers shoot Daniel Abeyta, man suspected of killing one woman and wounding another after he fires at one of several explosive devices made out of propane tanks that he had placed in a street.
lead_paragraph: Denver police officers shot a man suspected of killing a woman and wounding another after he fired at explosive devices made out of propane tanks that he had placed in a street.

headline.main: Colorado: Denver Man Is Shot After Firing at Propane Tank
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Denver Man Is Shot After Firing at Propane Tank
